name: Blocky Baseball: Home Run Hero
description:
Grab your blocky bat and step up to the plate, we’re gonna play some baseball.

Hit curveballs and fastballs, but dodge the paint bombs, in a fast, fun batting game. PLAY BALL!

FEATURES
• Easy to play baseball fun
• Retro style blocky graphics
• Collectable characters
• Different fields & weather effects
• Compete with friends
• Share your #Replay
